title: Sysdig Monitor
description: Learn the basics of Sysdig Monitor

courses.title: Application performance analysis
courses.description: Monitor the key metrics of a WS application. Identify performance bottlenecks and scale the application.

courses.title: Monitoring an application deployment
courses.description: Use Sysdig to explore and troubleshoot the errors produced after deploying an update to an application.

courses.title: Troubleshooting a containerized app with captures
courses.description: A dockerized app works well on the developer's laptop, but triggers errors when deployed on Kubernetes

courses.title: Advanced Kubernetes troubleshooting
courses.description: We deploy a multi-layered service, but the frontend pods die, becoming marked as CrashLoopBackOff
